item.description:
How about us North Shore & Cape Ann snow rats catch the latest Warren Miller film on November 3rd at 7:00 at Endicott College Auditorium. We'll meet at Acapulcos in Beverly at the Cummings Center at 5:00 for some nachos and libations. Doors open at Endicott at 6:30. More info and a link to buy tickets can be found on this page: http://www.skinet.com... More info about Acapulcos: http://www.acapulcos....

If you can't make it for nachos....meet us at the Endicott Auditorium @  6:30. Usually,  there are fun giveaways and free lift ticket ops at their shows.   Let's get the season off to a BANG!

Please RSVP!
item.name: Let's Catch Warren Miller's ". . . Like There's No Tomorrow" Flick
